# EnvironmentBlendingComponent.EnvironmentType

**Enumeration**

An enumeration of the environment types which support environment-blending.

## Declaration

```swift
enum EnvironmentType
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **EnvironmentBlendingComponent.EnvironmentType.surroundings**: The real-world surroundings of the user.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
